Was the mission successful? If so, NASA really needs to send up a rocket or something to get it; those Martian rocks are more valuable than that.
i just hope its aluminum fuel tanks rupture while ist nice and high. The fuel that thing containst is toxic as hell. At a guess i would say 60/70% of its weight is fuel too.

About a hour ago somewhere in Southern Pacific (or central Atlantics? they even can\'t tell it for sure initial version officially approved).

Rest In Pieces

How funny would it of been if this thing landed on the war mongers in Iran? The admiral who wants to station ships off the coast of America, the guys who want to close the strait? Rattle the saber long enough and Putin drops satellite on you!
